law.catch_line: In all cases where the appeal is not sustained the appellant shall pay the costs, and in all other c...
law.text: In all cases where the appeal is not sustained the appellant shall pay the costs, and in all other cases the court shall direct the costs to be paid in such manner and by such party as it may deem equitable and just; and the county commissioners shall be the appellee in such appeal, and shall levy as part of the county charges, and pay whatever costs and charges are so ordered to be paid by them, and all incidental expenses not therein provided for.
